chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above issue:

Good day, I received my iPhone 13. This should be in an 'excellent' condition. On one hand, there are visible scratches on the rear camera lens, and on the other hand, the speaker at the bottom right does not function or produces rustling/crunching sounds when playing music or videos. What can be done here? I would like to receive a new device and not send this one for repair. Since I've already transferred my old phone, I wanted to know if I can return this device when I receive a replacement device.

Kind regards,
Fabio Schäfer

Thank you very much for your help,

Hello Fabio,

You can find the return label attached to this message. Your return will be processed by Chronopost. Just drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. A list of locations is available here: 

Before preparing your return:
1. Follow the instructions on how to return an item <https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions>
2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product
3. Remove any existing protective wrapping or film
4. Pack your product and its accessories according to the tips below.

How to pack your product:
• The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product lying flat so it can't move during transport.
• Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a replacement label inside for identification in case the original one is lost or damaged).
• Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before shipping. This will protect you in case your product gets damaged during transport.

Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll notify you as soon as it arrives at our facility.

Best regards,
Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Claudia Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
